titleStmt.title: Discourses, or, Sermons on several Scriptures by ... Ezekiel late Lord Bishop of London-Derry.
titleStmt.author: Hopkins, Ezekiel, 1634-1690.

notesStmt.note: The first three sermons each have special t.p.
"Brotherly admonition" has special t.p. and separate paging.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
